Posts.Content: If I were you I would take her to a breast surgeon.  I know she is young, but you never know.  You mentioned the nipple area.  Is it itchy or cracked.  The way I look at it better to be safe than sorry.  I would certainly want another opinion.  FYI  there is a cancer that shows up in the nipple called Pagents.  I'm not saying that what it is, but again check it out.  Good luck.
Posts.Title: My 16 yr. old daughter

Posts.Content: Don't know if I would agree with your suregon.  4/05 I found I had Pagents of the nipple. Had mast 5/05 with 4 treatments of chemo. My nodes were clear.  Had reconst. started same time as the mast., with tissue expander put in at the same time.  Got final implant 1/06, with nipple reconst. 5/06.  I lead a very active life style too.  Taking care of our animals, carrying pails of water.  What I am saying is that my life style is back.  Yes it takes a little time to recover to say the least.  But you do what your gut tells you.  Might want to get a second from another doctor.  Can't say I agree with him, but that is my opinion.  Good luck to you. Wish you the best.
Posts.Title: Tough decision to make
